tag_list: html, css, php, seo, mysql, postgresql, sql, xhtml, social-media, network-effects
overview:
Shawn Mayzes has been a web developer since 2001, improving his skills over the years which each new project he takes on. He has worked on several different types of web sites for clients on the Fortune 500 list as well as many personal sites

He has experience in several different web based languages and is very proficient in PHP and XHTML/CSS as a primary base for development with a PostgreSQL or MySQL back-end. He is also experienced in ASP.NET C# using a MSQL back-end.
